Sentencas: 50 wt.-% of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 (SDC) is added to La0.85Sr0.15Cr0.9 Ni0.1O3 (LSCN) to investigate its use as an alternative anode for solid oxide fuel cells, especially for hydrocarbon fuels.
Titulo: Effects of the addition of SDC on the performance of a LSCN anode

Sentencas: When LSCN is mixed and sintered together with SDC or YSZ at 1,500 degrees C for 12 h no obvious second phase is observed from the XRD patterns.
Titulo: Effects of the addition of SDC on the performance of a LSCN anode

Sentencas: Although the conductivity of LSCN-SDC is lower than LSCN, the polarization overpotential is reduced by a factor of 10.
Titulo: Effects of the addition of SDC on the performance of a LSCN anode

Sentencas: The mixed electronic-ionic conductivity of SDC enlarges the reaction zone and improves the catalytic activity of the anode.
Titulo: Effects of the addition of SDC on the performance of a LSCN anode

Sentencas: The interface bonding between LSCN and the YSZ electrolyte is also modified by the nanometer SDC.
Titulo: Effects of the addition of SDC on the performance of a LSCN anode

Sentencas: An improved output performance on a self supported SOFC (LSCN-SCD/YSZ/PSM-YSZ) is obtained with H-2 fuel compared with CH4 fuel.
Titulo: Effects of the addition of SDC on the performance of a LSCN anode
